entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Caribou
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:47 PM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Caribou Point 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023
Temperature: -1.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -3.4°C
Wind: NNW 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then becoming light overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 16 except temperature steady near minus 5 along the Strait.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16 except temperature steady near minus 5 along the Strait. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023
